EmailTemplate.name: Ops Man Lite - Capacity Planning Tool.Capacity Planning Tool - Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}Get Ready To Satisfy That Demand
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for requesting the Capacity Planning Tool! Hi {{Lead.First Name:default=Planner}}, Thanks for requesting the Capacity Planning capability, a VMTurbo expert will reach out to you shortly and provide you with a license key and instructions on how to upgrade your current trial. You'll be planning your next deployment in no time! Your Demand-Driven Control platform,
VMTurbo
